website_summaries.verdict: A flavorful olive oil at a low price point – perfect for everyday use.
pros: This simple, affordable olive oil is packed with rich flavor
Just one tablespoon of oil will go a long way when added to pasta or salads
You can use this oil as a healthier alternative to vegetable oil in most baking recipes
The prominent olive flavor doesn't come through in the baking
When heated for cooking, this oil has a pleasant floral scent
cons: The large plastic bottle is difficult to handle
We suggest pouring out into smaller, refillable containers for regular use

customer_reviews.title: This oil has gone bad
customer_reviews.text: I buy this brand all the time locally and I love it. But this bottle from Amazon tastes completely different - it's bitter and nasty, and actually burns my mouth a little. Pompeian Robust normally tastes smooth and rich, but the bottle I bought from Amazon doesn't taste the same at all. I had to throw the whole thing out. No idea what they did to it to make it go bad. Not expired, but clearly not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping. Oil leaks aren’t worth it
customer_reviews.text: This huge bottle was shipped without being secured or wrapped. Who ships olive oil without precautions? The lid was off and flooded the box and all of the other contents and my garage with oil. I spent an hour cleaning it up and it’s still a mess. Sadly, I don’t know if the oil itself is good.....shipping preparation obviously isn’t a priority. I’m irritated about the mess and how my other items are now “highly moisturized.” Unless the shipping department can guarantee they will wrap and secure it, I’d advise skipping this purchase. The mess isn’t worth it not is the early morning doorbell from the postal guy who wasn’t very happy handling this mess too.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne andre

customer_reviews.title: This is the REAL thing!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy Pompeiian olive oil back in the 90s, when it was still in beautiful glass bottles. The flavor was exactly right for salads, grinders (sandwiches like subs), and on pasta. After moving to California I was not able to find it in the right "strength" for a long time, and now it's in plastic bottles. I don't remember it being designated as "Robust". But this is definitely the one! Try dipping some good bread into some of this with a little balsamic vinegar and I'm sure you'll agree it's a taste worthy of serving with a fine meal!
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Completely love this oil!
customer_reviews.text: I made the switch to evol for cooking years ago and this is the brand I went with. It has never let me down and I love it for all my regular cooking needs. I also like that you can buy the big bottles on amazon for a much better price then I've ever found in store. Amazon makes this affordable for someone on a budget and the quality is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Kiria

customer_reviews.title: The Robust has an excellent flavor profile and is perfect on salads and for ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the highest quality olive oil at any price!!! The Robust has an excellent flavor profile and is perfect on salads and for use in dips and marinades. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Geren

customer_reviews.title: Fruity taste
customer_reviews.text: This has a pretty forward floral/fruity taste, much like we had on a vacation to an olive orchard in Italy. I use it for all of my cooking that calls for olive oil. Less expensive to buy this giant bottle and decant into my smaller 500ml bottle for general use than to buy the smaller bottle from the grocery store. Overall a good value for a great oil.
customer_reviews.author: Jack A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make some of my family’s soap. I get consistent quality with each batch. I don’t sell soap so this size is good for the needs of my husband and me. I also use it for cooking. That way I don’t have a lot of wasteful containers.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey H

customer_reviews.title: Bitter
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle and this one is extremely bitter! The first bottle was fine. I have it ordered as a subscription but think I’ll have to cancel it. I don’t want to get another bad bottle. What could possibly make it so bitter?
customer_reviews.author: C. Perry

customer_reviews.title: No light olive oil taste whatsoever just heavy oil!
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! With the high ratings this brand grts,I expected to be able to dunk country bread into the oil like one does in some Italian restaurants and have that delicious taste of very good olive oil. Not at all - heavy unlike what I was expecting I do not know if you could even use it as a cooking oil. I would never buy this brand again. Although it really is the fault of the reviewer’s recommending it ias one of the top olive oil brands brands I bought the robust as possible that another of the oils would be more than my liking but I wouldn’t bother trying the brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Starving Artist

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. I use this oil mainly to cook, but it also tastes great on salads👍
customer_reviews.author: RomiNation

customer_reviews.title: Very mild with hardly any olive oil flavor
customer_reviews.text: Taste like vegetable oil with a bit of olive flavor that does not last more than a couple of seconds...I am picky about olive oil . My Dad was In olive oil wholesale. You get what you pay for....the plastic and the heat during shipping and storage may have exacerbated the situation.
customer_reviews.author: elias wawi

customer_reviews.title: Plastic bottle
customer_reviews.text: Oil is a great organic solvent and I prefer my oils to be kept in glass instead of plastic bottles. So 1 star deducted. Flavor is ok, I would give it 6.5 of 10. Neither fruity neither grassy but also not foul or rancid. It's good tasting oil, just not amazing. It's something you would use for cooking rather than drizzling over salad. All that marketing talk of "robust" and "full bodied" is just that, marketing. Being cheap (per oz) helps so you don't feel the pinch so you can be generous with it. Pro-tip: Get your oils in glass bottles so the chemicals don't leech into your food.
customer_reviews.author: PRIME

customer_reviews.title: Great product for cooking!
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil is delicious and.i really enjoy cooking so I use is frequently!
customer_reviews.author: Revere1970

customer_reviews.title: Nice strong flavor. Great for salads,pasta and pesto ,you can always dilute Full bodied,
customer_reviews.text: Being of Mediterranean origin and a fussy olive oil user,this is very good. A little expensive compared to giant Costco bottle of evoo but much handier(16oz).probably save in the pour and waste. The robusta is the one I am reviewing but most pompeian are of good to excellent quality. Not for frying. Low smoke point. Sometime on sale in supermarkets.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Not real olive oil
customer_reviews.text: This is not real olive oil. You get what you pay for. I put it in the refrigerator for 3 days and it is still liquid. I bought it to make soap with. Maybe it's good for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: It's my second purchase. I pour some into my oil dispenser. So this is a perfect deal for me considering the value for money. the price is cheaper than my neighbor's supermarket. Plus, no need to carry this heavy bottle on my own all the way to home.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Odd flavor to this olive oil
customer_reviews.text: Tried this brand for the first time. It seems to be a mix of multiple oils. It has an odd flavor that is not common for most olive oils. In fact, the made in country has 3 countries (of the 8 they list) so I definitely think it is a mix.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delicious
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely delicious, full flavored olive oil. Very robust. Makes excellent salads and goes well on anything. If you like a full-flavored olive oil, this is the stuff. This comes in a plastic bottle which can be recycled.
customer_reviews.author: ♥ Books and gadgets

customer_reviews.title: Great product, horrible packaging.
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the cap on this giant plastic bottle my heart immediately sank. From past experiences with similar products I knew what to expect and unfortunately my dread was confirmed. The VERY FIRST time after I used the oil, the cap "stripped" its threads upon resealing. Now I should have enough oil to last me months but don't because it's impossible to get a decent seal back on the bottle. Why do manufacturers do this kind of boneheaded stuff? Is this their version of engineered obsolescence? Buying a bottle this size actually isn't a bargin when a significant amount will be eventually unusable.
customer_reviews.author: O.

customer_reviews.title: Great olive oil
customer_reviews.text: We are super happy with this olive oil and have it on subscribe and save. We use it for so many things! The only problem is that the bottle is pretty thin...so by the time we receive it, it's all kinds of jacked up and won't sit properly on the counter. We are going to have to get a bunch of glass bottles to put it in...because there's just no way that the bottle provided is going to work out with any amount of use. The smaller bottles are a bit more durable. I would suggest either getting the smaller ones, or making sure that you have something else to put it in.
customer_reviews.author: Freya

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT IS FINE
customer_reviews.text: SOMEONE IS USING AMAZON TO FISH FOR CREDIT CARD ACCOUNT NUMBERS. I TRIED FILING A COMPLAINT WITH AMAZON BUT AMAZON IS NOT VERY USER FRIENDLY THAT WAY....THEY CALL TO ALERT YOU THAT SOMEONE JUST PURCHASED SOMETHING USING YOUR CREDIT CARD ON YOUR AMAZON ACCOUNT TO BUY (AND THEY LISTED THE ITEM AND THE AMOUNT). LONG STORY SHORT....I TOLD HIM I WOULD BE CALLING MY CARD COMPANY DIRECTLY AND HUNG UP. WHEN I CALLED MY CARD COMPANY, SHE SAID NO SUCH CHARGE HAD BEEN MADE. BE CAREFUL OUT THERE......MY INFORMATION IS OUT THERE......YOU MIGHT BE NEXT.
customer_reviews.author: CJ JAMBROSIC

customer_reviews.title: Burns tongues.
customer_reviews.text: Brand blends oils from 11 countries. A given bottle has oils from 3 of the 11 (Spain, Argentina, Tunisia, Italy, Greece, Turkey, Morocco, Chile, the US, Uruguay, Portugal). Our bottle was a blend from the first 3 of these. It burns our tongues, likely contaminated. Other bottles may have other blends and may be OK. This may explain why some reviews are negative and others positive. Countries of origin are stamped low down on bottle. Amazon will refund if oil is bad but one does not return it. How does one get rid of a half gallon of bad oil?
customer_reviews.author: Swasivious

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor!
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil is absolutely delicious. If you like strong flavors, this is the one to buy. It actually tastes like olives. I liked it so much that I immediately bought another, bigger, bottle. I see bread dip in my future!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, but pay attention to the flavor.
customer_reviews.text: At $10 for this large bottle, this is great. I made a mistake not paying attention that this is "robust" flavor. I'm not an expert in olive oils at all, not sure what this means. But the flavor is not what I'm used to. Still good. Ordered two bottles, they were shipped in the same box, no shipping damage, the plastic bottles survived the shipping great, no breakages and no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Pie

customer_reviews.title: It tasted fresh/excellent price/easy to use container
customer_reviews.text: I use olive oil for all my cooking; many times I would buy supermarket olive oil that had a strong taste (some call it a manure taste, I don't know what manure taste like, so I can only call it a strong flavor) but this is very pleasant tasting. I would recommend it to anyone to try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pompien olive oil is a very good oil`
customer_reviews.text: first time buyer and user of this Pompien olive oil, purchased it for a very inexpensive price at the local Wally world, got a 16oz hard plastic bottle that was dark green to keep UV light off of it, has a super easy top and pouring spout that makes pouring a breeze, I bought the Robust blend and it's a excellent clean fresh crisp tasting olive oil. will buy again, trying various brands in same size, just to find out which one I like and enjoy the most for cooking, frying salads, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip L

customer_reviews.title: They promise ROBUST and they deliver ROBUST!
customer_reviews.text: This oil grew on me so much I’m kind of hoarding it now. I started by trying it just dunking bread in it. This is where i didnt like it. It needed to be offset with a squirt of balsamic to be the perfect dunk. So, dont forget the splash of balsamic. But everywhere else i loved it: in soups, in salad dressings, in pastas, even on toast, with a drizzle of honey. We rarely find a well priced good olive oil. This one is might be it!
customer_reviews.author: Levana

customer_reviews.title: The taste is unbeatable (LOVE IT)
customer_reviews.text: The size is small for the price paid but the taste can not be challenged. The problem I had was that the container somehow leaked, either it had been squished or banged or one of the seals was not completely sealed...I don't know. I inspected the containers after unpackaging my shopping delivery and could not find where the spillage was coming from. Anyway No biggie I just wiped them down and all's fine, I will still use them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: This oil has changed. Not as good
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as it used to be. Does not taste like olive oil
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Best option for price and flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite olive oil. The robust flavor just adds an extra kick. I use it on salads and for cooking.This was a little bit cheaper than the store but it is more convenient to order it online since I’m always ordering things from Amazon anyway.It’s definitely better than most of the cheaper options. I know there are probably better ones out there but for the price and the flavor I’ll just stick to this.
customer_reviews.author: debbie L.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Has a good olive oil flavor, no off-notes, not too greasy. I'm not looking for anything special when it comes to EVOO, just a brand I like and can trust. For the price, this is my selection. Thank you for reading this review.
customer_reviews.author: Teh Arbitrageur

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I USE THIS OIL ON MY HAIR, LIPS AND LEGS. I ALSO DRINK TWO TABLESPOONS FULL A DAY AS OFTEN AS I REMEMBER. THIS OIL HAS A BITE TO IT WHICH MEANS THE OLIVES WERE GOOD. THE BITE COULD BE STRONGER BUT AT LEAST IT IS THERE, SOME OLIVE OILS HAVE NO STING TO THE TASTE. I WILL REORDER AS I AM JUST ABOUT USED IT ALL. I USE IN MOST OF MY COOKING AS WELL...SOUPS, SALADS, BREADS, PASTA, SEAFOOD...EVERYTHING JUST ABOUT.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful aromatic smell and bold robust flavor
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this olive oil! It has a bold and aromatic bouquet, and a complex robust flavor that is not overpowering. I use this for everything from cooking to dipping. For the price, it is an excellent value and I will be sure to keep my pantry stocked!
customer_reviews.author: Adam H.

customer_reviews.title: Pompeian robust extra virgin olive oil
customer_reviews.text: Pompeian robust extra virgin olive oil came today. It is large 68 fl.oz. bottle. I use it for cooking, salads, and marinades. I will not have to buy small bottle at grocery store at exorbitant prices. Actually this should last a good long while.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Wasserman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice olive oil!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tasty olive oil at a great price! Cheaper than in stores and it's great quality. I use them for cooking mostly. I see this can also be used in skincare DIY. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hao J.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product was leaked when I received it. And the oil got on other product that is also in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ming Qian

customer_reviews.title: Olive oil is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I buy this over and over! Be careful I purchased an olive oil & my husband told me there are substitute or hijaked Olive oils! To my surprise 1 I bought is sunflower oil! I couldn't believe it. Although, sunflower oil is good oil for certain things when I want Olive oil, it better be Olive oil. I use both oils now but I know what is what. He calks it the "Agra-Mafia"! :D
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: olive oil has a ton of uses.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, did you know you can use this for many things such as: shaving creme substitute furniture polish (add lemon juice and vinegar) helps clean sticky things frizzy hair shine stainless steel in your bath! remove paint shoe polish, yes it works!
customer_reviews.author: StevenJones

customer_reviews.title: This thing is huge!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my Mom because she would get the small bottles from the local grocery store or the local Dollar General. I figured I would search Amazon to see if it even existed in a bigger size to cut down on both the cost and store visit. I should have known that Amazon had exactly what I was looking for. The bottle is huge! I am so glad that I ordered it for my Mom. She will be using the oil to cook, for diy projects, or to simply brag to her friends that her daughter got her a lot of extra virgin olive oil. Whenever this bottle is finished, I will look into buying more.
customer_reviews.author: #blackgirlchemist

customer_reviews.title: Great Olive Oil - great taste and great cost
customer_reviews.text: I found this from searching for a large bottle of olive oil and am so happy I found this. It is a great price (even better than the one I usually buy from Costco) and it tastes and cooks great. I don’t often do the subscribe and save but this would be a product that makes sense to do it for since I run through it every couple months and it’s an easy way to save a little extra!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wasserman

customer_reviews.title: I use this company for their grape-seed oil and cooking sprays which i love, but i'm not impressed with their olive oil
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I use this company for their grape-seed oil and cooking sprays which i love, but i'm not impressed with their olive oil. Very little flavor for extra virgin, and it comes from a half dozen countries around the world which makes me think the quality of the oil just isn't as pure as most.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Aly

customer_reviews.title: I couldn’t get the cap off
customer_reviews.text: The cap has arrows indicating unscrewing like a normal cap. It isn't how it works. I didn't figure it out until I actually cut the cap off, so now I don't have a cap for the bottle. Beware, the cap lifts off, so as you rotate it, lift it, and pull hard. Once off, it works pretty well. But no indication of how it works, so it can be confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Lindauer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this olive oil for the value. Taste is pleasant, color is good, no sign of rancidity. I use it for cooking and roasting veggies. While it can't compete with a top shelf boutique olive oil for salad dressing or dipping fresh bread, it is more than adequate for my other needs. Beats all other oils in this price range. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping around trying to see if I could find a better price than what I was paying at my local grocer when I came across this product. It's cheaper than what I had been paying, but still high quality ( I actually prefer the robust flavor of this product). A nice large bottle that will last a long time, it arrived on time and secure, no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great. Will certainly buy again
customer_reviews.text: I ran out of the Palestinian olive oil I usually buy, where the profits go to helping the kids in Gaza. I bought this as a stop gap measure. I didn't think it would be as good as it is. It's excellent.
customer_reviews.author: ConsiderThis

customer_reviews.title: My last order was for this
customer_reviews.text: I was sent Happy belly. Not as good. I wish amazon's tasted/smelled as good as pompeiian, because I know the Italian olive oil industry has adulteration problems and I trust Amazon. If I recall correctly, Pompeian has a certificate of authenticity, the value of which I don't strictly know.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Ross, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: BITTER
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst olive oil I've ever tasted. Ordered 5/16/20 received 5/19/20. Date on bottle 9/30/21 Don't buy "Robust" it will ruin whatever food it's used on.
customer_reviews.author: sailor

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size olive oil for those who use it constantly! It's not as flavorful tasting as other olive oils I've tried imported from the Mediterranean countries, but I use it mostly for cooking purposes to help add more flavor to the food. Would recommend if you're looking for affordable olive oil in bulk size.
customer_reviews.author: maofla

customer_reviews.title: Doses not taste like I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and found out after the fact about the shady track record of this company's history with the quality of their oils. I will be purchasing from a local reputable olive oil company next time. I live olives and this doesn't taste like olives at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: Pompeian Olive Oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that has stood the test of time. It is well known and an excellent oil for salad dressings, bread dipping and light frying. I usually coat any meat I am cooking with it to help with moisture, taste and something healthy for the spices, salt and pepper to cling to.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton W. Duggan

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many of these oil bottles over the past year. They usually are good and have a rich flavor. However some are off. The taste is off as if it went bad. The price also keeps going up. Maybe time to look for alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Fashion Talk

customer_reviews.title: Yes it is Robust
customer_reviews.text: Good olive oil but it is just what it says "Robust," For someone who may not want an oil that is "quiet" this is not the one but if you want it to have some "character" its for you. Haven't tried this yet but probably good as a bread dip.
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for twenty years. Versatile! Great for sauteing shrimp and scallops. I use it in my marinade for prime rib, rib eyes and sirloin steaks. Perfect for coating potatoes so the Kosher salt adheres to the potato prior to baking.
customer_reviews.author: Technically Proficient

customer_reviews.title: Strong taste and flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is the ideal olive oil. I regularly use the El Gallo brand. Is a very good portuguese brand, and this oil dont have any to envy. Its ideal for salads if you like the strong body and taste of the olives.
customer_reviews.author: Patricio

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Olive Oil
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting olive oil - but there is only A faint grassy/green up-front olive taste and a faint peppery finish. Both could be stronger but great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Kushner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent strong flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I love dipping home-made bread in olive oil, and this brand is the tastiest. I recommend and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Very good all around.
customer_reviews.text: Not amazing in any way, but very good in all ways - except packaging. There has just got to be an easier-to-hold bottle out there though! I pour this into an empty wine bottle and use that.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: I Was A BIt Concerned Due To The Great Price. The Quality and Flavor are Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that this oil might be old, or of poor taste due to the price and bulk purchase size. I was pleasantly surprised at the natural color and great taste. This is a recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. O'connor

customer_reviews.title: Whether to heat eggs or drizzle over salad this Olive Oil is exceptional to ones palate.
customer_reviews.text: I cook or prepare food with olive oil every day. It adds a sophisticated taste to anything it’s added to that it would pair well with...vinaigrette’s, marinades, tenderizer, pasta, garlic infused, brushed on dough before baking, sautéed...the possibilities are endless and exploration in the kitchen makes the adventure more exciting with quality ingredients like Pompeian Robust Extra Virgin Olive Oil.
customer_reviews.author: Teeta

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary flavour and price
customer_reviews.text: I did not know that it was possible to pay $10-$15 for this quantity of oil with this flavour profile. It is incredibly flavourful! Now, all my toasts are somehow dredged with this oil instead of butter. This is literally one of the best deals on Amazon, in my book.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and 0 star
customer_reviews.text: It was a total waste of money. I want to give 0 star. The taste of this product was bitter. I thought it was a poor condition so I wanted my money back, but there's only one option, try one more product. So I got a new product for free, but the taste was awful like the first one. I had to throw both of them out.
customer_reviews.author: Bobalover

customer_reviews.title: We bought this value-priced oil for lamp oil.
customer_reviews.text: It burns prettily and smokeless in the olive oil lamp, but if blown out rather than aggressively snuffed out, it spews a lot of smoke for awhile... Just something in the learning curve of having an olive oil lamp I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmmm
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure we have extra virgin olive oil running through our veins over here. We use A LOT of olive oil and this brand is fresh and flavorful. It’s also cheaper on Amazon. I’d put it on subscribe and safe, but we need one every week and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: This has a lighter flavor that I like , and good in salads and works in an oil spritzer
customer_reviews.text: I like this oil and use it for salads only This has a nice olive flavor but isn't heavy or bitter At the time of purchase was priced okay and I needed it delivered I use this in an oil spritzer .
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Really good for you at least good for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have almost used up this olive oil. I actually take a tablespoon with a sprinkle of Himalayan salt twice a day before eating a semi heavy meal. It has done wonders for my digestion.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, leaked during shipping
customer_reviews.text: The olive oil is great, the only reason it didnt get a full 5 stars is because a good bit leaked out during shipping. Other than that the olive oil is great.
customer_reviews.author: DJW

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Really great value for the price. The bottle is huge and lasts forever. The flavor is great for cooking and salads. It's definitely not the most delicious, pure olive oil flavor, but it's good if you mix is in a dressing.
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this. Originally thought for salads & cold dishes. But the flavor is so good (I love a strong taste) that we ended up using it for so much more (sautéing, frying, etc...). This will be a regular in my kitchen. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kama

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my indian style cooking but the flavor overpowers everything. Seems like a good in terms of cost per lb though. Decent for other uses in salads etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Pretty standard olive oil as far as I can tell
customer_reviews.text: Pretty standard olive oil as far as I can tell. Smells fruity and floral when it warms, works well in cooking. Try replacing vegetable oil with olive oil in boxed brownie mixes. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: mynxkatTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Item was received squashed
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is excellent, however the packaging was insufficient and the bottle was squashed and some oil was leaking. It's too much for me to return it, but I am not too happy.
customer_reviews.author: barbara a. starace

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent stuff for the price. Flavor is ok, nothing special. Better for salads and marinades. Little mild for drizzling or dunking but no bitterness like some in this price range have. Might buy again.
customer_reviews.author: loonery,  Boston, MA

customer_reviews.title: they are good extra virgin olive oil
customer_reviews.text: i got these because i didn't want to go to grocery store during pandemic.... they are extra virgin olive oil... you should know why you're getting them
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Not Robust
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this EVO because it was represented as ROBUST. Anything but... Not bad for cooking but not for dressing a salad. I won't return it but I will have to find another oil for salads and dressings.
customer_reviews.author: Chef P

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Works great for cooking or even dipping bread in. Love the price! I use it with just about any veggies we grill or for marinating chicken with seasoning.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size that I only found on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: large bottle and very cost-effective to buy this size. But, I have a smaller bottle to pour the olive oil in that is more user-friendly to use from day-to-day.
customer_reviews.author: Janis M.

customer_reviews.title: Best olive oil!
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family loves this oil. We add it mostly to salads, or simply with home-made bread.. On Amazon it is slightly cheaper than in stores.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Pompeian Robust Extra Virgin Olive Oil is Delicious Addition
customer_reviews.text: Pompeian Extra Virgin Olive Oil is a delicious addition to your salad. It is packaged in a sturdy plastic bottle. It is a great combination with balsamic vinegar for your fresh mozzarella.
customer_reviews.author: One Student

customer_reviews.title: YESSSSSSSSSSSSSS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! A fabulous value, insane quality, and fast shipping. I use that S on everything (baking, cooking, everything but frying). Excellent value and product!
customer_reviews.author: pinkyme

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised Extra Virgin Olive Oil Blend
customer_reviews.text: Since I enjoy cooking and know olive oil well, was so pleasantly surprised with the purchase. Since I am an extra olive oil snob, really liked the flavor and blend. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Metro

customer_reviews.title: It's Olive Oil!
customer_reviews.text: It's Olive Oil!! I'm not a connesiour (did I spell that right?) Oh well, there is a lot in the bottle for the price and it tastes good on my food. I have purchased this several times and will continue to if the price stays right.
customer_reviews.author: Mz Juicy

customer_reviews.title: Good product and easy delivery.
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered in a short time and is exactly the same product I am used to - but I didn't have to go out to a store to get it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for this price
customer_reviews.text: so much quantity and quality for this price is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Stavin Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is into "real" olive oils and found this one. She is pleased and price is good too. It's all worth it if my wife says it's good.
customer_reviews.author: despond

customer_reviews.title: This is not extra virgin olive oil!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not extra virgin olive oil!! EVOO is green in color & has a distinct taste - this doesn't. It's yellow when you pour it out. The green plastic bottle is very deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil, I wish it was available in metal tin
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find EVOO at this price that tastes good, is consistent, and fresh. I do wish it was available in metal tins. It is not a high end oil, but is suitable for everyday use and is mellow/not bitter.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great but makes your pee smell funny
customer_reviews.text: This is a great oil for marinades, salad dressing and cooking and it tastes pretty good too. One side effect though is it makes your urine smell like you just ate asparagus.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Promagan

customer_reviews.title: Pompeian Robust Extra Virgin Olive Oil
customer_reviews.text: Was it exactly what was listed? Yes Any issue with shipping? No Did the product meet your needs/wants? Yes, very much Any issue with the product? No
customer_reviews.author: Genelyn Weaver

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting olive oil I have ever had in my 64 years of living. It is more reasonable to purchase it on Amazon than in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Whitethunder44

customer_reviews.title: Authentic and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have put it on salads and a few other foods already. I would highly recommend it. You can even use it to lightly fry certain things (not deep fry). I will purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Ares

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This brand has that subtle but yummy olive oil taste that I have been searching for. I tried a lot of different brands in order to to find one that tastes so amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Tracee

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste for cooking and for salad dressing!! You get more for your money, and it tastes like some higher end olive oils I have used in the past!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: great value for EVOO
customer_reviews.text: quality stuff that taste great. opted to get the largest bottle for savings and just refill my small bottles
customer_reviews.author: natataka

customer_reviews.title: Mild
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I bought Spanish olive oil. Flavor wise it is milder than Italian varieties
customer_reviews.author: nhp

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Robust delicious!😋
customer_reviews.text: Delicious on salads and in spaghetti or other sauces. I do not sauté with it, but I add it for flavor.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Big bottle very good quality olive oil
customer_reviews.text: Excellent olive oil. First food purchase and I am very pleased with the quality of this oil. Very fresh and light on the tongue. Perfect for cooking and adding to salad or hot foods that need a little oil to meld flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Rancid!
customer_reviews.text: The olive oil was rancid when I received it and since I'm not leaving the house I can't return it. I feel Amazon is really letting us down during this pandemic and it's very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AliceB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great olive oil at a great price. I just use this for cooking so it serves the purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: One bottle severely dented but product is okay.
customer_reviews.text: Love this olive oil. I use it to cook, bake bread, on salads. Good mixed with bagel seasoning for bread dip.
customer_reviews.author: L Lesley

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use as a hot oil treatment for my dry hair. I also use it for cooking. I absolutely love this oil!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

product_meta.title: Pompeian Robust Extra Virgin Olive Oil, First Cold Pressed, Full-Bodied Flavor, Perfect for Salad Dressings and Marinades, Naturally Gluten Free, Non-Allergenic, Non-GMO, 68 FL. OZ., Single Bottle
product_meta.description: Size:68 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)| Style:Olive OilPompeian has been bringing olive oil to the American table for over 100 years. Pompeian Olive Oils are perfect for sautéing, grilling, baking, frying, roasting and in salads, soups, sauces and marinades. Naturally gluten free and non-allergenic, Pompeian Olive Oils are available in four varieties: Extra Virgin, Classic Pure, Extra Light Tasting and Organic Extra Virgin. Robust Extra Virgin Olive Oil complements any dish, enhancing its true flavors rather than dominating them. The olives used in our Extra Virgin Olive Oil add a delicate accent to marinades, pastas, and salad dressings. Robust Extra Virgin Olive Oil is first cold pressed and has less than 0.5% acidity.
feature_bullets: Imported, first cold pressed extra virgin olive oil
Perfect for pasta, marinades and salad dressings

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
